name: 新斗罗大陆：动画卡牌新霸主！
summary: A popular game adaptation of the chinese manhua/novel/anime Soul Land/Douluo Dalu/Combat Continent by the author TangJiaSanShao. Free gifts and perks available to enable free players to thrive even without recharging or spending money. Experience the awesome storyline and unlock new features as you progress through the game
